# [Interview #1037: Steelheart Signing Report - Argent, Entry #13](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1037#13)

#### Question

Is spiritual DNA inherited the same as regular DNA?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Inherited similarly, but not 100% identically, to regular DNA.
